column4: Hi, I'm trying to convert a rpm to deb using alien. it gives me an error. can someone have a look and tell me whats wrong? http://pastebin.com/d445bb9ed
you need sudo to run alien
did you install alien via repos?
is there not a debian native alternative?
unfortunately not. IBM only supports SLES and red hat
if theres an RPM is there not source you can compile?
you will need to provide those libraries that alien is moaning about
no. let's just say i've got to work with these packages :(
thats what i thought...libraries are tricky...what should i install?
webseach for each library it wants in turn with the word "provides" at the start of each search
you mean those *.so files, just to be shure?
I'll try that. thank you so far
funny thing: google searching libgpfs.so got me directly to a "hot-to" TSM ubuntu blog entry
